description.value:
A user in possession of it gains +10 to Command Tests, and once per game session may take a Full Action and make a -10 Scholastic Lore (Military Tactics) Test. On success allies in 20 metres can make a Delay Action as a Free Action until the user's next turn

Requirements

A Tome that provides wisdom to the reader.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
